name: NPR
text: .@MorningEdition asked how people staying at home are planning to celebrate this Thanksgiving â€” and got hundreds of responses. Most are limiting gatherings to a handful of family members while gearing up to connect with other relatives virtually. https://t.co/9bXj8QzCxy

name: NPR
text: Germany is extending its current coronavirus lockdown measures through mid-December, Chancellor Angela Merkel said. But for Christmas, some residents will be given some leeway. Members of one household can meet up with 10 people between Dec. 23 to Jan. 1. https://t.co/JYARrpirNh
